content: It was after Donald Trump first publicly announced his interest in Bitcoin and other crypto coins during his presidential campaign last year, that the price began to surge high. As the time he made that publication in July 2024, Bitcoin price was less $70k but later later moved to a little above $109k January this year after he was sworn in as the president of the US. On Sunday, he announced the creation of a US Crypto Strategic Reserve which Bitcoin and other few coins are part of the project. I strongly believe that when this is finally implemented, it'll have a major positive effect on Bitcoin price which is likely to make it go higher than the current ATH and that's where my question comes in. How can we as Bitcoiners and the crypto community position ourselves to make the best out of this latest development that's about to hit the market?https://x.com/Vivek4real_/status/1896391535568244874?t=w68v7SMaEOUGVtEAM189IQ&s=19
